description: Allows an application to listen for network condition observations.  This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDITIONS

description: Allows an application to call into a carrier setup flow. It is up to the carrier setup application to enforce that this permission is required This is not a third-party API (intended for OEMs and system apps).
name: android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP

description: Must be required by an android.service.notification.NotificationListenerServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to control keyguard.  Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD

description: Allows access to keyguard secure storage.  Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECURE_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to read the current set of notifications, including any metadata and intents attached.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS

description: Allows an application to hold an UpdateLock, recommending that a headless OTA reboot *not* occur while the lock is held.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK

description: Allows the holder to access content providers from outside an ApplicationThread.  This permission is enforced by the ActivityManagerService on the corresponding APIs, in particular ActivityManagerService#getContentProviderExternal(String) and ActivityManagerService#removeContentProviderExternal(String).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVIDERS_EXTERNALLY

description: Allows applications to access serial ports via the SerialManager.
name: android.permission.SERIAL_PORT

description: Must be required by package verifier receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.
name: android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER

description: Package verifier needs to have this permission before the PackageManager will trust it to verify packages.
name: android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_AGENT

description: C2DM permission.  Used internally.
name: android.intent.category.MASTER_CLEAR.permission.C2D_MESSAGE

description: Allows an application to mark traffic as from another user for per user routing.  Used by system wide services like media server that execute delegated network connections for users.
name: android.permission.MARK_NETWORK_SOCKET

description: Allows an application to account its network traffic against other UIDs. Used by system services like download manager and media server. Not for use by third party apps.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUNTING

description: Allows an application to manage network policies (such as warning and disable limits) and to define application-specific rules.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY

description: Allows an application to read historical network usage for specific networks and applications.
name: android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HISTORY

description: Internal permission protecting access to the encryption methods
name: android.permission.CRYPT_KEEPER

description: Must be required by default container service so that only the system can bind to it and use it to copy protected data to secure containers or files accessible to the system.
name: android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA

description: Allow an application to read and write the cache partition.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM

description: Allows applications to write dream settings, and start or stop dreaming.
name: android.permission.WRITE_DREAM_STATE

description: Allows applications to read dream settings and dream state.
name: android.permission.READ_DREAM_STATE

description: Allows applications to set a live wallpaper.  XXX Change to signature once the picker is moved to its own apk as Ghod Intended.
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_COMPONENT

description: Internal permission protecting access to the global search system: ensures that only the system can access the provider to perform queries (since this otherwise provides unrestricted access to a variety of content providers), and to write the search statistics (to keep applications from gaming the source ranking).
name: android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH_CONTROL

description: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data.  Typically it used when the provider has some permissions protecting it (which global search would not be expected to hold), and added as a read-only permission to the path in the provider where global search queries are performed.  This permission can not be held by regular applications; it is used by applications to protect themselves from everyone else besides global search.
name: android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH

description: Allows applications to change the background data setting.  Not for use by third-party applications.  pending API council
name: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING

description: Internal permission allowing an application to query/set which applications can bind AppWidgets.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_APPWIDGET_BIND_PERMISSIONS

description: Private permission, to restrict who can bring up a dialog to add a new keyguard widget
name: android.permission.BIND_KEYGUARD_APPWIDGET

description: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data.  The normal user flow is that a user picks an AppWidget to go into a particular host, thereby giving that host application access to the private data from the AppWidget app.  An application that has this permission should honor that contract.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET

description: Must be required by a android.widget.RemoteViewsServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS

description: Allows a package to launch the secure full-backup confirmation UI.  ONLY the system process may hold this permission.
name: android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP

description: Allows an application to control the backup and restore process.  Not for use by third-party applications.  pending API council
name: android.permission.BACKUP

description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics
name: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS

description: Allows an application to collect component usage statistics
name: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS

description: Allows read/write access to the 'properties' table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES

description: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES

description: Allows an application to perform CDMA OTA provisioning
name: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING

description: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED

description: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR

description: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH

description: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS

description: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED

description: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user.  Only available when the device is running in manufacturer test mode.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST

description: Allows low-level access to tun tap driver
name: android.permission.NET_TUNNELING

description: Allows low-level access to power management.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER

description: Required to be able to reboot the device.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.REBOOT

description: Required to be able to disable the device (very dangerous!).  Not for use by third-party applications..
name: android.permission.BRICK

description: Allows an application to capture secure video output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to capture video output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to capture audio for hotword detection.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD

description: Allows an application to capture audio output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to control low-level features of Wifi displays such as opening an RTSP socket.  This permission should only be used by the display manager.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY

description: Allows an application to configure and connect to Wifi displays
name: android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY

description: Allows an application to take screen shots and more generally get access to the frame buffer data.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER

description: Allows an application to use SurfaceFlinger's low level features.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER

description: Allows an application to grant or revoke specific permissions.
name: android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE

description: Allows an application to move location of installed package.
name: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE

description: Allows an application to delete packages.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to delete cache files.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES

description: Allows an application to clear user data.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA

description: Allows an application to install packages.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES

description: Allows low-level access to setting the keyboard layout.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT

description: Allows low-level access to setting the pointer speed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED

description: Allows low-level access to setting the orientation (actually rotation) of the screen.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION

description: Required to add or remove another application as a device admin.
name: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN

description: Must be required by a android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER

description: Must be required by a android.net.VpnServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a TextService (e.g. SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE

description: Must be required by the PrintSpooler to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.nfc.cardemulation.HostApduServiceor android.nfc.cardemulation.OffHostApduServiceto ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.printservice.PrintServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD

description: Allows an application to retrieve the current state of keys and switches.  Not for use by third-party applications.  The API that used this permission has been removed.
name: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE

description: Allows an application to retrieve private information about the current top activity, such as any assist context it can provide.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO

description: Allows an application to tell the activity manager to temporarily stop application switches, putting it into a special mode that prevents applications from immediately switching away from some critical UI such as the home screen.
name: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES

description: Allows an application to call the activity manager shutdown() API to put the higher-level system there into a shutdown state.
name: android.permission.SHUTDOWN

description: Allows an application to watch and control how activities are started globally in the system.  Only for is in debugging (usually the monkey command).  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER

description: Allows an application to magnify the content of a display.
name: android.permission.MAGNIFY_DISPLAY

description: Allows an application to temporary enable accessibility on the device.
name: android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCESSIBILITY

description: Allows an application to retrieve info for a window from the window manager.
name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_INFO

description: Allows an application to register an input filter which filters the stream of user events (keys, touch, trackball) before they are dispatched to any window.
name: android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS

description: Allows an application to inject user events (keys, touch, trackball) into the event stream and deliver them to ANY window.  Without this permission, you can only deliver events to windows in your own process.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS

description: Allows the application to temporarily freeze the screen for a full-screen transition.
name: android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN

description: Allows an application to manage (create, destroy, Z-order) application tokens in the window manager.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS

description: Allows an application to open windows that are for use by parts of the system user interface.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW

description: Allows an application to update application operation statistics. Not for use by third party apps.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS

description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics
name: android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS

description: Allows an application to update device statistics.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS

description: Allows an application to force a BACK operation on whatever is the top activity.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.FORCE_BACK

description: Allows an application to be the status bar.  Currently used only by SystemUI.apk
name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR

description: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC

description: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES

description: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH

description: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT

description: Configure an application for debugging.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP

description: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.  Not for use by third-party applications, because Log entries can contain the user's private information.
name: android.permission.READ_LOGS

description: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DUMP

description: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to install and/or uninstall CA certificates on behalf of the user.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_CA_CERTIFICATES

description: Allows an application to use any media decoder when decoding for playback
name: android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_PLAYBACK

description: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.
name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE

description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state
name: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE

description: Allows an application to allow access the subscribed feeds ContentProvider.
name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ

description: Allows applications to write the apn settings.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS

description: Allows rename of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME

description: Allows mount / unmount of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT

description: Allows destruction of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY

description: Allows creation of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE

description: Allows access to ASEC non-destructive API calls
name: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS

description: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS

description: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS

description: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents.  These are broadcasts whose data is held by the system after being finished, so that clients can quickly retrieve that data without having to wait for the next broadcast.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY

description: Allows an application to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.  If you don't request this permission, you will not receive the broadcast at that time.  Though holding this permission does not have any security implications, it can have a negative impact on the user experience by increasing the amount of time it takes the system to start and allowing applications to have themselves running without the user being aware of them.  As such, you must explicitly declare your use of this facility to make that visible to the user.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED

description: No longer useful, see addPackageToPreferred for details.
name: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS

description: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.
name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE

description: This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.
name: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY

description: Modify the global animation scaling factor.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE

description: Allows an application to retrieve the content of the active window An active window is the window that has fired an accessibility event.
name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTENT

description: Allows an application to call forceStopPackage.
name: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES

description: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.
name: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION

description: Allows an application to access all multi-user external storage
name: android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Change the screen compatibility mode of applications
name: android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBILITY

description: Allows applications to read the sync stats
name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS

description: Allows applications to write the sync settings
name: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS

description: Allows applications to read the sync settings
name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.
name: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR

description: Allows applications to set the system time zone
name: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE

description: Allows applications to set the system time.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_TIME

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER

description: Allows an application to open windows using the type TYPE_SYSTEM_ALERT, shown on top of all other applications.  Very few applications should use this permission; these windows are intended for system-level interaction with the user.
name: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW

description: Allows an application to call killBackgroundProcesses.
name: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES

description: The restartPackage API is no longer supported.
name: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to start any activity, regardless of permission protection or exported state.
name: android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY

description: Allows an application to create/manage/remove stacks
name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACKS

description: Allows an application to change to remove/kill tasks
name: android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS

description: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks
name: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS

description: Allows an application to get full detailed information about recently running tasks, with full fidelity to the real state.
name: android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS

description: Allows an application to call APIs that allow it to query and manage users on the device. This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_USERS

description: Fuller form of INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS that removes restrictions on where broadcasts can be sent and allows other types of interactions.
name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS_FULL

description: Allows an application to call APIs that allow it to do interactions across the users on the device, using singleton services and user-targeted broadcasts.  This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS

description: Allows an application to get information about the currently or recently running tasks.
name: android.permission.GET_TASKS

description: Allows applications to disable the keyguard
name: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD

description: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS

description: Allows an application to write to internal media storage
name: android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to write to external storage.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your '>getExternalFilesDir and getExternalCacheDir.
name: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to read from external storage.  Any app that declares the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is implicitly granted this permission. This permission is enforced starting in API level 19.  Before API level 19, this permission is not enforced and all apps still have access to read from external storage.  You can test your app with the permission enforced by enabling Protect USB storage under Developer options in the Settings app on a device running Android 4.1 or higher. Also starting in API level 19, this permission is not required to read/write files in your application-specific directories returned by getExternalFilesDir and getExternalCacheDir.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.
name: android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to use SIP service
name: android.permission.USE_SIP

description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.
name: android.permission.CALL_PHONE

description: Allows read access to privileged phone state.  Used internally.
name: android.permission.READ_PRIVILEGED_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows read only access to phone state.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.
name: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc.  Does not include placing calls.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows an application to monitor, modify, or abort outgoing calls.
name: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS

description: Allows disabling the transmit-indicator LED that is normally on when a camera is in use by an application.
name: android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSMIT_LED

description: Required to be able to access the camera device.  This will automatically enforce the ' <uses-feature> manifest element for all camera features.  If you do not require all camera features or can properly operate if a camera is not available, then you must modify your manifest as appropriate in order to install on devices that don't support all camera features.
name: android.permission.CAMERA

description: Allows an application to record audio
name: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO

description: Allows registration for remote audio playback.
name: android.permission.REMOTE_AUDIO_PLAYBACK

description: Allows access to configure network interfaces, configure/use IPSec, etc.
name: android.permission.NET_ADMIN

description: Allows access to hardware peripherals.  Intended only for hardware testing.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST

description: Allows an application to access the MTP USB kernel driver.  For use only by the device side MTP implementation.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_MTP

description: Allows an application to manage preferences and permissions for USB devices
name: android.permission.MANAGE_USB

description: Allows an application to modify global audio settings
name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS

description: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available
name: android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR

description: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming
name: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK

description: Allows access to the flashlight
name: android.permission.FLASHLIGHT

description: Allows access to the vibrator
name: android.permission.VIBRATE

description: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode
name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE

description: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER

description: Allows an application to manage the list of accounts in the AccountManager
name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS

description: Allows an application to request authtokens from the AccountManager
name: android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS

description: Allows an application to act as an AccountAuthenticator for the AccountManager
name: android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS

description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service
name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS

description: Allows access to the loop radio (Android mesh network) device.
name: android.permission.LOOP_RADIO

description: Allows an internal user to use privileged ConnectivityManager APIs.
name: android.permission.CONNECTIVITY_INTERNAL

description: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC
name: android.permission.NFC

description: Allows bluetooth stack to access files This should only be used by Bluetooth apk.
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_STACK

description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN

description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH

description: Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state
name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE

description: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks
name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE

description: Allows applications to access information about networks
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE

description: Allows applications to open network sockets.
name: android.permission.INTERNET

description: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.LOCATION_HARDWARE

description: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER

description: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands
name: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS

description: Allows an application to create mock location providers for testing
name: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION

description: Allows an app to access approximate location derived from network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

description: Allows an app to access precise location from location sources such as GPS, cell towers, and Wi-Fi.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION

description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.
name: com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL

description: Allows an application to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.
name: com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's browsing history and bookmarks.
name: com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS

description: Allows an application to read (but not write) the user's browsing history and bookmarks.
name: com.android.browser.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS

description: Allows an application to write to the user dictionary.
name: android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY

description: Allows an application to read the user dictionary. This should really only be required by an IME, or a dictionary editor like the Settings app.
name: android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's calendar data.
name: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR

description: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.
name: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's personal profile data.
name: android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE

description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.
name: android.permission.READ_PROFILE

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's social stream data.
name: android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM

description: Allows an application to read from the user's social stream.
name: android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.  Note: If your app uses the WRITE_CONTACTS permission and both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher.
name: android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG

description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.  Note: If your app uses the READ_CONTACTS permission and both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher.
name: android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.
name: android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS

description: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.
name: android.permission.READ_CONTACTS

description: Allows an application to monitor incoming WAP push messages.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH

description: Allows an application to write SMS messages.
name: android.permission.WRITE_SMS

description: Allows an application to read SMS messages.
name: android.permission.READ_SMS

description: Allows an application to read previously received cell broadcast messages and to register a content observer to get notifications when a cell broadcast has been received and added to the database. For emergency alerts, the database is updated immediately after the alert dialog and notification sound/vibration/speech are presented.  The 'read' column is then updated after the user dismisses the alert.  This enables supplementary emergency assistance apps to start loading additional emergency information (if Internet access is available) when the alert is first received, and to delay presenting the info to the user until after the initial alert dialog is dismissed.  Pending API council approval
name: android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS

description: Allows an application to receive emergency cell broadcast messages, to record or display them to the user.  Not for use by third-party applications.  Pending API council approval
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BROADCAST

description: Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages, to record or perform processing on them.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
